channel.title: Cross Validation on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in Cross Validation on Orange

item.title: Cross Validation
item.description: How good are supervised data mining methods on your classification dataset? Here’s a workflow that scores various classification techniques on a dataset from medicine. The central widget here is the one for testing and scoring, which is given the data and a set of learners, does cross-validation and scores predictive accuracy, and outputs the scores for further examination.
